_header: Lex is laid a-down / And veritas is but small
_description: Evils of the Time — four lines (aabb)

BodTan407.Transcription:
Lex is leyd a downAmor is ful smalCaritas
                    owte of townVeritas is go with al
BodTan407.Editions:
Louis,  Cameron,
                        ed.  
             The Commonplace Book of Robert Reynes of Acle: an edition of Tanner MS
                407.
         New York: Garland, 1980: 181.

YaleBei365.Transcription:
Lex ys leyd a-downe And veritas ys but
                        smallAmor ys owt of TowneAnd Caritas ys gon with
                    all
YaleBei365.Editions:
Smith,  Lucy Toulmin,
                        ed.  
             A Commonplace Book of the Fifteenth Century.
         Norwich: Kerrison, Goose, 1886: 20.
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 347.
